channel.title: Posts on Boris Blagov
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Boris Blagov

item.title: Spring Joint Economic Forecats 2019
item.description: The Spring Joint Economic Forecast has been published! See the publication here.

item.title: New RWI economic forecasts
item.description: The March 2019 RWI – Leibniz institute for economic research forecasts for the international and the German economies have been published. See the publication here..

item.title: Presenting at the Eighth Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics
item.description: I will be attending ICEEE 2019 conference in Lecce, Italy where I will present my paper Exchange rate uncertainty and import prices in the euro area on Friday, the 25-th. My talk will take place in Room 3 of Building 6 (Campus Studium 2000) in the session from 14:30 to 16:10. I have created a calendar .ics file which mimics page 3 from the program. You may import it in your calendar app and add the Rooms to the sessions that you want to attend.

item.title: Welcome to my new website
item.description: Hello from my new webpage! I am migrating from my wix website. My previous webpage was rather slow and resource intensive and most of all updating anything required quite a bit of effort on my part. This website is built with Hugo and is a pleasure to make, so I am confident that I can stay on schedule with updating this one. Shoutout to the creator of the theme - George Cushen.
